name: Dissonance (SemayI)
description:
Dissonance is a game for those who want's challenges. It's not easy, it's not gonna take you by a hand. But, I think, it's the type of game where you feel like you've done something really great when you succes.

This game is a project I had for my 1st year in my school, it's my first game of this kind and the first real project that I have done.

I have done all the features by myself except for the backgrounds and the musics.

I'm already working as the Game Designer for a next game with people that are better than me at programming and drawing.  Hope you will follow us and our new projects. 

See you soon, 

SemayI
